title: Dazzling Diamond Drop Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
materials: G-H Color). Features Hyderabadi Polished gold.
features: Teardrop (drop) design, showcasing a halo setting of diamonds around the central cluster. The open metalwork allows light to enter for maximum sparkle. The rose gold adds a modern yet warm touch. This pendant can be paired with any light and minimal chain.
occasions: or as a stunning addition to your everyday wardrobe. Can also be worn for a Seemantham
description: This exquisite diamond pendant offers a timeless blend of modern design and exquisite craftsmanship. The sparkling diamonds and rose gold provide a touch of luxury and elegance. The halo setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds, making it a truly eye-catching piece.
